001package edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.service;
002
003import com.google.gson.Gson;
004import com.google.gson.GsonBuilder;
005import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.Game;
006import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.Guess;
007import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
008import okhttp3.OkHttpClient;
009import okhttp3.logging.HttpLoggingInterceptor;
010import okhttp3.logging.HttpLoggingInterceptor.Level;
011import retrofit2.Call;
012import retrofit2.Retrofit;
013import retrofit2.adapter.rxjava3.RxJava3CallAdapterFactory;
014import retrofit2.converter.gson.GsonConverterFactory;
015import retrofit2.http.Body;
016import retrofit2.http.GET;
017import retrofit2.http.POST;
018import retrofit2.http.Path;
019
020public interface CodebreakerServiceProxy {
021
022  @POST("games")
023  Single<Game> startGame(@Body Game game);
024
025  @GET("games/{id}")
026  Single<Game> getGame(@Path("id") String id);
027
028  @POST("games/{id}/guesses")
029  Single<Guess> submitGuess(@Path("id") String gameId, @Body Guess guess);
030
031}
